title: Scottish country dancing: Mrs MacLeod
creator_credit: Stanley Russell, JPC Productions and Thames and Clyde Film Company
brief_description: Shows the traditional Scottish dance, the reel. Demonstrates such movements as set two and turn corners and four hands across and back. Concludes with a reel danced to the tune of “Mrs MacLeod”.
creator_credit_for_label: Stanley Russell, JPC Productions and Thames and Clyde Film Company
description: Shows the traditional Scottish dance, the reel. Demonstrates such movements as set two and turn corners and four hands across and back. Concludes with a reel danced to the tune of “Mrs MacLeod”.
